title: tvplus006
author: tvplus006
content: What happened: Ponzi scheme 600% PROFIT AFTER 6 HOURSFlag type 1 (support/oppose): https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3133 Thread Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5444883.0Archived: https://web.archive.org/web/20230315120949/https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5444883.0Scammer Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3515970Website: https://procoininvest.com/Archived: https://web.archive.org/web/20230315120953/https://procoininvest.com/Quote   Domain Name: PROCOININVEST.COM   Registry Domain ID: 2745879309_DOMAIN_COM-VRSN   Registrar WHOIS Server: whois.hostinger.com   Registrar URL: http://www.hostinger.com   Updated Date: 2022-12-19T20:38:08Z   Creation Date: 2022-12-19T20:38:07Z   Registry Expiry Date: 2023-12-19T20:38:07Z

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Flag supported, nice catch, keep up the great workA stupid Ponzi scheme and illogical investment plans. These scammers only know deception and plunder innocent people's money without rights. They even do not stop promoting their schemes. Unfortunately, you find them promoting them everywhere. We are tired of them; they are the bad side of this field.Quote from: roksana20 on March 14, 2023, 05:31:18 PM0.26 BNB - $82.60 received instantly Thanks to procoininvest.com adminTx link - https://bscscan.com/tx/0x9584995e1b938c0a08fe63f12e7e381d1458300f63f415b79385ae6a9f741f90Good admin and instant payment alwaysQuote from: roksana20 on March 15, 2023, 06:15:25 AM$1790.21 Usdt just received instantlay. Thanks procoininvest.comProof - https://tronscan.org/#/transaction/7d0db0f8235cea917093e433adb473270bc490b55c3d8dcedf67eecd81e8bc5eThis is the day i will not forget i got big payment instantly.Thanks to procoininvest.com adminQuote from: roksana20 on March 14, 2023, 02:19:13 PMSo i will suggest to try this system quickly and make quick payment.I am so much happy got payments instantly.He tries to pump his topic and puts false payment proofs in order to trap the victims as much as possible to test their Ponzi system and deposit and then lose their funds. What a shame ><I wish anyone would stay away from this scam and not risk their money.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Trying to prove that they are legit by showing a certificate will not make them a potential scam even if the certificate is legit it's still a potential scam and any investment platform that offers double the money daily is considered a Ponzi scheme.They do not have a legit business to back them they are stealing people's money by looking legitimate. https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/14582687

comments.author: Getmon
comments.body: Your investment will increase by 600 percent in an hour? I suppose that anyone, even those without a high school education, can spot this kind of fraud.I supported the flag too. I am sure that an active bitcointalk member could not be victimized. However, the fake testimonies will undoubtedly deceive greedy new members and non bitcointalk members looking for online testimonials, proofs and reviews about the reputation of the platform.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Getmon on March 16, 2023, 11:32:33 AMYour investment will increase by 600 percent in an hour? I suppose that anyone, even those without a high school education, can spot this kind of fraud...I don't even understand for whom such unrealistic interest rates are calculated so that someone can believe it and invest their money. The fraud is so obvious that I doubt that anyone will believe in such an unrealistic profit and part with their money.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: This never ceases to amaze.The number of scams out there will never go down simply because the number of people that fall for them must be high enough for them to recycle the same profit making fake promises to gullible people. I hope people manage to wise up and start avoiding going anywhere near websites that claim to have unbelievable ROI otherwise they will lose the funds they sent to the scammers.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Quote from: tvplus006 on March 16, 2023, 10:28:18 PMQuote from: Getmon on March 16, 2023, 11:32:33 AMYour investment will increase by 600 percent in an hour? I suppose that anyone, even those without a high school education, can spot this kind of fraud...I don't even understand for whom such unrealistic interest rates are calculated so that someone can believe it and invest their money. The fraud is so obvious that I doubt that anyone will believe in such an unrealistic profit and part with their money.Enjoy- https://youtu.be/thMP0ZpGlDwQuote from: JollyGood on March 17, 2023, 12:01:58 AMThis never ceases to amaze.The number of scams out there will never go down simply because the number of people that fall for them must be high enough for them to recycle the same profit making fake promises to gullible people. I hope people manage to wise up and start avoiding going anywhere near websites that claim to have unbelievable ROI otherwise they will lose the funds they sent to the scammers.That website gave me flashbacks of the first time someone approached me about bitconnect and sent me the company link. The piss poor grammar is baffling to me..it’s like they aren’t even trying. The return charts are a joke of course etc etc. Sadly, the VAST majority of people are clueless and remain clueless. I’m an FA, so I see this ignorance all day every day. I get asked about crypto a lot..most own utter shitcoins (knowing absolutely nothing about them) and never once has a single client even known what a hot wallet or hardware wallet is. They sure as shit don’t understand cold storage, forks etc. I recommend Trezor like crazy but I’m willing to bet maybe 25% of them actually heed my advice. I sent a spare ledger wallet to a buddy I worked with (a fellow FA) maybe 3 years ago. Explained how corrupt Coinbase is etc. He texted me when FTX went down and said “this is why you told me to use ledger right, but isn’t Coinbase safer than FTX”. Once again I explained..still hasn’t moved his coins.  People in large part are extremely lazy and immune to good advice. So sadly, these obvious scams have plenty of scamming opportunities to look forward to.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Flag Supported Just opened the site and this is definitely a classic Ponzi Scheme the High Yield Investment Program nice catch tho but believe it or not site like this is popping off every day. and you can find a bunch of others here https://www.allhyipmonitors.com/ But its rarely they promoting in this forum stay away guys there is no way to get rich quickly. Looking up on who is and found this, the site is 89 days old"HOW DOES PROCOININVEST EARN PROFITS FOR ITS MEMBERS?Procoininvest is managed by our experienced team of cryptocurrency experts. We are involved in cryptocurrency trading and mining and use this platform to share our profits with our members." - https://procoininvest.com/?a=faqExpert Team hehehe
